items.title: Stocks To Watch: HAL, Puravankara, Airtel, IRCTC, Indus Towers
items.description: Stocks to Watch: DIT's acquisition of American Tower Corporation's operations in India, has made it the largest mobile tower company in the country, ahead of Indus Towers.

items.title: Silver trading strategy today: Buying the dips recommended; key levels here
items.description: On Thursday, spot silver rallied to a nearly three-week high on Fed rate cut bets and firmer industrial commodities.

items.title: Gold trading strategy: Support seen at Rs 73,000; Resistance at Rs 75,200
items.description: After consolidating in the $2470-$2530 range for nearly three weeks, spot gold rallied to a fresh record high of $2555 on Thursday.

items.title: Bull spread strategy recommended for Nifty Bank by HDFC Securities today
items.description: Short covering is seen in the Bank Nifty Futures, where we have seen 9 per cent fall in the open interest with Bank Nifty rising by 1.49 per cent.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty today: Trading guide for Indian stock markets on Sept 13
items.description: Stock market today, Sept 13, 2024: Indian stock market investors will react to August CPI inflation data, ECB rate cut, and eye Western Carriers IPO on Friday

items.title: Stock Market LIVE updates: GIFT Nifty signals positive open for India markets; Asia markets mixed
items.description: Stock Market LIVE updates: Markets in India were expected to start on a positive note, following a marginally higher than expected inflation print, coupled with higher IIP reading.

items.title: Dividend, Bonus Issue, Stock-split: These 80 shares turn ex-date today
items.description: Sportking India, Onesource Ideas Venture, and Krishna Institute of Medical Sciences will trade ex-date for the subdivision of their stocks that they have announced

items.title: PN Gadgil Jewellers IPO: Will you strike gold? Check allotment status & GMP
items.description: Once the allotment is finalised, investors can check the allotment status of PN Gadgil Jewellers IPO by visiting the official websites of BSE, NSE, or  Bigshare Services

items.title: HPL Electric & Power secures order worth Rs 144-crore; share price rises
items.description: The uptick in the HPL Electric & Power share price came after the company announced that it has bagged an order worth R 144 crore.

items.title: F&O Insights: Bulls take charge as Nifty, Bank Nifty PCR jumps over 1
items.description: Derivatives market update for Sept 13: Data shows FIIs added fresh longs in Nifty futures, while covering some shorts in Bank Nifty; Retail, DIIs up short bets. Analysts upbeat on near-term outlook.

items.title: HG Infra Engineering share price up 5% on securing Rs 716-crore work order
items.description: The HG Infra share price rose after the company received a letter from the Central Railway regarding the appointed date for the Rs 716-crore project.

items.title: Here's why Puravankara share price hit 5% upper circuit on Sept 13; details
items.description: The stock's rally was fuelled by the company's announcement of securing redevelopment rights of Miami Apartments at Breach Candy, South Mumbai.
